nodes.text: Rowralorr was a male Wookiee who worked as a gunsmith at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY. During this period he lived on the floating mining colony of Cloud City, which was located in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin. There, he plied his trade selling blasters and other weaponry on Market Row, a commercial corridor in the city's Port Town district.

Rowralorr first appeared in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. The Wookiee is listed as a merchant players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
